creator: MTransit Apps
descriptionHtml:
This app adds Cowichan Valley Regional Transit System (BC Transit) buses information to MonTransit.

This app provides the buses schedule and news from YouTube and @BCTransit on Twitter.

Cowichan Valley Regional Transit System buses serve Duncan, Cobble Hill, Mill Bay, Shawnigan Lake and Victoria in British Columbia, Canada.

Once this application is installed, the MonTransit app will display buses information (schedule...).

This application only has a temporary icon: download the MonTransit app (free) in the "More ..." section bellow or by following this Google Play link http://goo.gl/pCk5mV

You can install this application on the SD card but it is not recommended.

The information comes from the GTFS file provided by BC Transit.
https://bctransit.com/*/footer/open-data

This application is free and open-source:
https://github.com/mtransitapps/ca-cowichan-valley-transit-system-bus-android

This app is not related with BC Transit and Cowichan Valley Regional Transit System.

Permissions:
- Other: required to read news from YouTube and Twitter
descriptionShort: Cowichan Valley Regional TS buses for MonTransit. Schedule. Alerts. News.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Schedule from October 28, 2019 to December 31, 2020.
Tweets from @BCTransit.

This app adds Cowichan Valley Regional Transit System (BC Transit) buses information to MonTransit.

This app provides the buses schedule as well as the latest alerts and news from @BCTransit on Twitter.

Cowichan Valley Regional Transit System buses serve Duncan, Cobble Hill, Mill Bay, Shawnigan Lake and Victoria in British Columbia, Canada.

Once this application is installed, the MonTransit app will display buses information (schedule...).

This application only has a temporary icon: download the MonTransit app (free) in the "More ..." section bellow or by following this Google Play link https://goo.gl/pCk5mV

You can install this application on the SD card but it is not recommended.

The information comes from the GTFS file provided by BC Transit.
https://bctransit.com/*/footer/open-data

This application is free and open-source:
https://github.com/mtransitapps/ca-cowichan-valley-transit-system-bus-android

This app is not related with BC Transit and Cowichan Valley Regional Transit System.

Permissions:
- Other: required to read alerts and news from Twitter
descriptionShort: Cowichan Valley Regional TS buses for MonTransit. Schedule. Alerts. News.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Schedule from February 5, 2023 to December 31, 2023.
Tweets from @BCTransit.
